violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Do not meet requirements of rule
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Repair/replace to meet requirements of rule.

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: FOOD EMPLOYEES shall wear hair restraints such as hats, hair coverings or nets, beard restraints, and clothing that covers body hair, that are designed and worn to effectively keep their hair from contacting exposed FOOD; clean EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, and LINENS; or unwrapped SINGLE-SERVICE or SINGLE-USE ARTICLES.

(A) PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them clean.
(B) Except spill cleanup, cleaning shall be done during periods when the least amount of FOOD is exposed such as after closing.

A chemical SANITIZER used in a SANITIZING solution for a manual or
mechanical operation shall meet these limits or as otherwise approved: (P)
	Chlorine        ppm           pH<10             pH<8
		      25              120 F              120 F
		      50              100 F              75 F
		     100              55 F               55 F
                 Iodine           a concentration of between 12.5 and 25 ppm and minimum temp of 75 F and pH of 5 or less or meets manufacturer's specifications. (P)

                Quats            minimum temperature of 75 F, hardness of 500 ppm or less and meet manufacturers use directions. (P)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Provide correct concentration as stated above.

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) Dressing rooms shall be used by EMPLOYEES if the EMPLOYEES regularly change their clothes in the establishment.
(B) Lockers or other suitable facilities shall be used for the orderly storage of EMPLOYEE clothing and other possessions.
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: A designated employee storage/locker area shall be provided and used.
